ai-tha-ap474:2.2_0: he was born as a great man.
ai-tha-ap474:2.3_0: and there I had been exceeding from the continuation of existence.
ai-tha-ap474:3.2_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap474:3.3_0: like Indra, the finest of gods.
ai-tha-ap474:5.2_0: worshipped the world with its gods.
ai-tha-ap474:6.3_0: The Teacher standing in the sky,
ai-tha-ap474:7.4_0: or else together with the ministers.’
ai-tha-ap474:8.1_0: After saying this, the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap474:8.2_0: Wealth is the best of towns,
ai-tha-ap474:8.3_0: went to the Buddha, bowed down to him.
ai-tha-ap474:9.1_0: the lord of the gods similes, after worshipping the Similes with sixty-two...
ai-tha-ap474:9.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap474:9.3_0: the hundred and seventy-four can endure
ai-tha-ap474:10.1_0: From the first day of the night;
ai-tha-ap474:10.4_0: if you look down on me,
ai-tha-ap474:11.1_0: Six thousand less than six thousand.
ai-tha-ap474:12.3_0: they shake me out with a retinue,
ai-tha-ap474:12.4_0: this trunk fruit is like a gem.
ai-tha-ap474:13.1_0: Ill beat the gems of the gems.
ai-tha-ap474:15.2_0: Endowed, they get familiar with him:
ai-tha-ap474:15.4_0: where all creatures of all acts,
ai-tha-ap474:16.1_0: I’m not able to do a deed,
ai-tha-ap474:16.2_0: I’m not able to get food
ai-tha-ap474:18.1_0: would be embarrassed by the gems.
ai-tha-ap474:19.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap474:19.4_0: this trunk fruit is like a gem.
ai-tha-ap474:21.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap474:23.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Maṇicūḷaka.
